website_summaries.verdict: Great space saver to replace a traditional hamper. Highly durable, practical, and easy to use, freeing up floor space in a dorm.
pros: Since it’s not mesh, dirty clothes aren't visible
Unzips in the back for convenient unloading
Has capacity for at least one laundry load
cons: Provided hooks are a bit flimsy – may be preferable to choose your own hooks

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad
customer_reviews.text: Would be exactly what I need, but it has a TERRIBLE odor. Looks to be good quality but when I took it out of the package it smelled like fish. Thought if I hung it up to air out, maybe the smell would go away, but it ended up smelling up the whole room. I’m going to wash it and see if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Higgins

customer_reviews.title: The perfect solution
customer_reviews.text: This hamper is great! It fits perfectly on the door, is very unobtrusive in my small bathroom, and is just the right size. The hooks are easy to work with and bend to the right shape so they fit beautifully under the door frame, not impeding the opening and closing of the door at all. The hooks are small, light, and not very noticeable from outside the door. Bag is constructed well. All seams are tight and well sewn.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hooks not as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the pink one first. The hooks were as the ones in the picture-- very flat. I was thrilled that because of how flat they were, my doors could still close. No hooks ever fit our doors! (They are old). I ordered a second one in coffee and the hooks were different than pictured, and my doors could no longer closed. So disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: JAG

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids room!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to save space in my son's room. Those toys pile up fast! Love how this hangs up out of the way. Seems like pretty good quality material. Came with door hooks or wall hooks for the bathroom. One complaint is that if I wanted to use this, it would definitely not work very well for adults. It fills up fast enough with my sons 2T clothes. So I would say if you are an adult looking for something similar find something else unless you wash your clothes daily and it's just you. But perfect for kids clothes!
customer_reviews.author: mck

customer_reviews.title: This one is the perfect size for my clothes - it doesn't have a ...
customer_reviews.text: Lost my old hamper thanks to hurricane Harvey and needed a quick replacement. This one is the perfect size for my clothes - it doesn't have a huge capacity, but it'll hold a week's worth of clothes (I wear scrubs to work). Super convenient zipper on the bottom is perfect for dropping the clothes into the washer. The hooks are a bit loose on the doors (the hooks will tilt on the door and keep the door from closing), but it comes with adhesive pads to tighten it up. I haven't used them though, so I can't comment on whether or not they help. Overall a great hamper for tight spaces, kids, or adults who don't need a huge hamper.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff L.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: If you have someone in your household that constantly leaves clothes in the bathroom and you have no room for a hamper this will be a LIFE SAVER! It looks just like the picture and is a good quality. It also came with the two door hooks and it also has a zipper at the bottom to easily load the clothes in the washing machine! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Taryn Weingardt

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was thoroughly impressed when I opened my package with the laundry nook. I got one for each bathroom and I'm go glad I did! They are made from very strong cotton and are put together well. I forgot about the zipper on the bottom for easy emptying! It sits flush to the door and is not an eye sore like some other mesh ones I have had in the past. I highly recommend to anyone looking for over the door laundry bags
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver and best solution to many issues in our home
customer_reviews.text: I hate clutter and so I love this hamper because it frees up floor space and there are no excuses for dirty laundry on the floor! I bought two and they've been working out fantastic. This hamper keeps pets out of the dirty laundry; the dog loved to use our dirty laundry basket as a bed and the cat thinks laundry basket/litter box...same same right?
customer_reviews.author: Monica Flores

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my toddler's room, thinking I would have to empty it every few days, but it holds a lot more clothes than it looks like it would. When you unzip the bottom, the clothes fly right out, no shaking necessary. This thing is really cool.
customer_reviews.author: K. Neumann

customer_reviews.title: Great Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: We have a small bedroom so this is perfect. I've had it for years with no issues. I would give 5 stars except that the hooks damaged our door by rubbing off the paint. It's a crappy door so I don't much care, but if you buy this, it might be a good idea to get some felt stickers to affix to the hooks. It'd be even better if the company included them with purchase. I bought a second one for our daughter's room, and my best friend also bought one and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Farmer

customer_reviews.title: just what I needed to quit tripping over laundry
customer_reviews.text: Great product; looks nice over our bathroom door. Fits probably 1-2 loads depending on what's inside. Large hole and overall convenient. We had quite a few issues getting it to hang over the door and still having the door shut. The clips were too wide so any weight would cause them to hang down. The pads that were included were a nice addition to combat the problem but we ended up bending the hooks and screwing them into the door :/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon3Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: They sent me a different brand-- "laundry nook" instead of urban mom. Lame-- I guess we'll see if it's any good or not. Well, after only one day of having it, the hook has sheared, the fabric is thin and I'm completely dissatisfied. I haven't even had it long enough to put laundry in it! I used the foam to ensure correct fit to the door. Cheap product! I'm returning this!
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: functional
customer_reviews.text: It worked very well to have it in the bathroom, the original idea was in a closet but it wasted as much space as a basket, since when filling it with clothes it gets bigger, what I loved was the transfer of clothes, easier and if you go up or down stairs it is easier to transport clothes.
customer_reviews.author: sendy g.

customer_reviews.title: Saves space.
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a ton of space in my house, and didn't really know where to keep a hamper other than my bedroom. I'd much rather have a hamper in the bathroom, though, but mine didn't fit. This solved that problem. Takes up very little space and hangs from the top of the door. I haven't had any issues with it and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J. W.

customer_reviews.title: Great color and design
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, quality looks like it will last. I don't have children running around so this will never get overstuffed but zipper seems like it would hold even if it was. Better design than my last one...I love practical items and this is a good one!
customer_reviews.author: Friendly Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Love the bag, but hooks do not fit standard door
customer_reviews.text: The bag and zipper are good quality, and I love that I don’t have to take it off the door. Unzip to drop laundry into a basket and take to the wash. Only giving 3 stars because the hooks provided don’t work with standard doors. They won’t allow the doors to close. With dozens of reviews with the same complaints, my hope was that the hooks would be improved. They’re unfortunately the same meta hooks. I’m going to buy some 3M stickable/easy removes hooks instead, and that’ll do the trick. Just know you’ll need to probably purchase those in addition to purchasing this hamper until the hooks are updated for standard door clearance.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Our old hamper was too bulky for our space. This is a perfect replacement. The hangers are thin enough to fit perfectly over the door without scrapping, the colour is great, the hole is large enough to not catch the items awkwardly, and I love that I an just put my laundry basket (transport each rooms laundry) under the bag and unzip for easy transportation. The only thing better would be if this company had more products 😎 UPDATE: Just bought a second one for the kids' room Fuller review on my blog at SimplyKyra
customer_reviews.author: Kyra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an RV
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We bought two of these and hung them on a door with heavy duty command hooks, one on top of the other. They work perfect in our RV. Update: We have had these now for a over a year and they have been absolutely fantastic. One of the zippers finally broke and it was likely us being too hard on them. I will absolutely buy another one to replace it. They hang great on the heavy duty command hooks and even full they have never fallen!
customer_reviews.author: PookieAndTheBear_com

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs!! Hides behind the door with no buldge that keeps the door far from the wall. The hooks it came with didn't fit well inbewteen the frame so I added my own hooks to the door but no big deal! The zipper on the bottom makes emptying it a breeze!! Just put a laundry basket underneath to catch em you're set! A must buy!
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Great to hid a big laundry pile but doesnt hold as much as youd like
customer_reviews.text: This is a great concept. But it doesnt hold as much laundry as you would like. But then again, it all depends on how often you do your laundry. It can hold at least 1 load no problem, but a medium sized load of laundry. I usually do laundry after there is 2+ loads worth so I might have to get a second one and just somehow hang it underneath it in someway. Other than that, practicality purposes, its great to hid the ugly pile of laundry
customer_reviews.author: Rino Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, Mom approved
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for us. With two young boys I just hang it on the bathroom door and throw everything in it as I walk by. Great quality, the zipper on the bottom is awesome I just throw a laundry basket underneath it, open the zipper and all the dirty clothes fall in. The only way I could like it more is if it actually washed and folded the clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany M.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps that ball of dirty clothes from collecting at the top of the stairs!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! We hung this right by the basement stairs for all the toddler and kid stuff that kept piling up by the door! I set up a little command center and used command hooks to hang it with! I’ve washed it dozens of times and it always comes out great! It holds a ton and it empties so easily via the zipper on the back. It’s not usually so wrinkly but the pic gives you the idea!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Harris

customer_reviews.title: Loving this hanging laundry bag.
customer_reviews.text: Love this hamper....I have been trying to find a way to declutter and in a small home with a very small laundry space this is perfect to clear up floor space! The design is nice and the quality of the actual bag is great. My favorite part is the zipper at the bottom of the bag to make it easy to toss laundry into the wash! They even included thick adhesive to help keep the metal hooks in place. I definitely will order another so I can have one for lights and darks.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B

customer_reviews.title: Alternative use: Toy storage
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute! I have a pair of boys that feel the need to sleep with every stuffed animal they own (which is a ridiculous number lol). I got these and wall mounted them on hooks (not included) so their stuffed animals can be near them and accessable without every one of them being in the bed. The zipper is at the bottom on back so they can quickly let the animals loose and then zip it back and toss them in the top when its time to clean up. Everything seems pretty sturdy and roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, durable, space saver
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my small laundry room. I needed a place to put wet/kitchen towels to keep other laundry from getting bleach or mold on them. This works great. I hung it on the back of my door, the zipper at the bottom is awesome, everything just falls right out when it’s time to wash. Very durable and has held up to having a huge comforter stuffed in it, along with some very heavy work jeans of my husbands.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Castle

customer_reviews.title: When it arrived I was surprised it was folded nicely in a reusable see thru zippered bag
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived I was surprised it was folded nicely in a reusable see thru zippered bag. I repurpose items when possible, so I may do that with the bag or use it to store the laundry hamper when not in use. Ok now about the hamper. It's great. The only change if I were to make one would be to put some kind of non-slip material under the metal hooks, that go over the door. This would allow the laundry hamper to remain stretched apart while on door, making it easier to put clothes in. But otherwise you're gonna love it. Oh and the zippered release on the lower backside. Very nice touch and smart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too high up for small children
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product for older kids but not so much for smaller children. When I hung the hamper from the top of the door, the opening was so high up that my seven year old daughter could not reach to put her clothes into it. We modified it and used command strips to lower it. So far it is working well--this would be nice for teenagers and college students. The bag itself is true to color and appears to be of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ash B.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Space Saver!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a product that would allow me to still have an area specifically for dirty clothes but would allow me to save as much space as possible...and I definitely found it with this product! Very easy to put together and I absolutely love the zipper at the bottom that allows me to empty the hamper without having to take each piece of clothing out the little whole at the top. I am very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Janay R.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: The hooks I received are either used, oxidated or they should have not passed quality control (see enclosed picture). For a product that comes brand new and packaged this is unacceptable. Otherwise it looks cool.
customer_reviews.author: Adba M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hamper!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 young girls kept on leaving their dirty laundry on the bathroom floor and their bathroom is too tiny for a regular hamper. This is the perfect solution to get the clothes off the floor and out of the way. I went ahead and ordered another for my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: CoreeKback

customer_reviews.title: Get a couple of these!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really useful. I keep different laundry collection containers around the house and this is one of them. You can't see it in the picture, but there is a horizontal zipper in the back towards the bottom, so you can just unzip that to dump the dirty laundry into the machine instead of having to pull them out one by one.
customer_reviews.author: Arthus

customer_reviews.title: No More Floor Laundry
customer_reviews.text: I keep this right on my bathroom door for my dirties before I shower. It fills up fast if you don't rewear your pants and shirt a time or two. But perfect for underwear. It's easy to use and clean. Plus when you empty it you feel like Han Solo opening up a tauntaun the way everything falls out, haha.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Standard
customer_reviews.text: Great durability, but doesn’t hold much. I feel like I’m doing laundry every few days with this being my only bag/basket
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Great for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: This perfect if your limited on space in a nursery. We really don’t have room for a large hamper and this fits over a door. I also love how there is a hole for the dirty clothes and a zipper at the bottom. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my life
customer_reviews.text: Totally the best solution for my dry cleaning pile. I have the space for a regular laundry hamper but not for two. I had a problem with dry cleaning piling up in corners of the room or back seats of my car between visits. Hung this bag hamper on my door and it solved the problem. Didn’t just solve it, it’s perfect solution. Small hole for throwing stuff in, then easily comes off hooks, contains all clothes until arriving at destination, then has full bottom zipper to dump clothes on dry cleaner counter for counting. Changed my game
customer_reviews.author: Robert Watzke

customer_reviews.title: Not As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I specifically ordered this bag because I wanted 100% cotton, and my bag that just arrived is a cheap-feeling, crunchy plastic. I am so disappointed. Even the branding is different from what I saw on other people’s photos. Don’t know how this has gotten so many good reviews. I wish I didn’t waste my money.
customer_reviews.author: Kate H

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this item! It hangs over my door and out of the way. It holds a lot of clothes. And instead of lugging a laundry basket downstairs, I just toss this down. Then unzip the bottom and it sends the dirty clothes right into my washer. Can then carry the empty bag back upstairs and hook it to the door. Makes hauling laundry so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly designed hamper
customer_reviews.text: I love that this doesnt take up any floor space! It hold just enough for a load of laundry and I live the convenience of busy putting my laundry basket under it, unzipping the back and now my laundry is ready to take easily to the washing machine. Handy little item!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, helpful, sturdy, hides behind door
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these for months, works so well! Small enough but holds a lot. Using in college dorm but hauling home for weekly washing, very sturdy. Washes clean right along with the rest of my laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great concept
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea. It doesn’t hold a whole lot of dirty laundry, but I use it in the nursery, so it works for me. It doesn’t feel like it’s made out of the best material, so not sure how long it will last. Very happy with it so far though. Makes laundry and organizing one step easier.
customer_reviews.author: M&A

customer_reviews.title: It’s EXACTLY what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This laundry hamper was exactly what I needed for my new apartment. It hangs on the door perfectly (without scratching the top of the door frame) & the zipper on the bottom makes it super easy to empty out its contents when doing laundry. I would’ve loved it even more if it had a strap to carry it when you want to take your clothes to the laundromat/laundry room but it’s exactly as advertised & it’s easy to transport as is.
customer_reviews.author: Ramana S.

customer_reviews.title: We ordered a dozen of them for a project and they worked great! They fit right on the back of the ...
customer_reviews.text: These were just what we needed. We ordered a dozen of them for a project and they worked great! They fit right on the back of the doors and were easy to unzip at the bottom to get the contents out. The bag is very lightweight and can be easily washed if they get "dirty clothes" smelling....These would be great for teenagers or college dorms or kids or on the inside of a closet *Probably not recommended for big bulky towels or items though. A good value and arrived quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Dawnell444

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: This product is an absolute game changer. I have a tiny apartment with a very tiny bathroom. Being able to use vertical space is essential. I have previously had over the door products that either scratch the door or cause it not to close properly. The hooks that come with this also come with padding that you attach before hanging so your door does not get damaged. I also didn't realize that the bottom had a zipper which makes doing laundry a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Edin

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it...
customer_reviews.text: Allows her to keep clothes off the floor in the laundry room. Convenient over the door, great for small areas. Deducted one star as I thought it was a bit over-priced.
customer_reviews.author: R. Adamson

customer_reviews.title: Love this space-saving laundry bag
customer_reviews.text: This hanging laundry bag is a great addition to our small home. We were using a hamper/basket in the little hallway leading up to our bathroom, but this laundry bag is a much better solution. I didn't want to buy hooks because I was worried the door wouldn't shut as well so my husband put two nails in the door and hung this up using the nails. I love the zippered bottom - the clothes drop right into my laundry basket.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great product, maybe have an option to buy with a couple of command hooks?
customer_reviews.text: Constructed extremely well; over the door hooks didn't work with my particular door as not enough space between door and door jamb. However, I liked this product so much I bought a couple of command metal hooks and attached them to the back of the door for this. Perfect for a single person household. Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Oregon

customer_reviews.title: 2 of these help me organize my laundry.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2; one for whites and one for darks. Have them hanging on heavy-duty metal hooks in the porch just outside of the kitchen. Wish they were a little larger. The zipper on back makes it easy to dump into a top-loading machine. So far so good. Hope they hold up. Reasonable price. The door hangers should be strengthened; a bit flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this, we have two
customer_reviews.text: Love this, we have two, great for our nursery and small guest bath. It's made from a sturdy canvas like material and I've washed them both several times. The best part is the zipper at the bottom so you can easily dump everything into the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Squiggles

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Great laundry bag so far. We've had it almost two months and have washed it once a week along with the other soiled baby clothes. So far it's holding up well and makes it easy to carry laundry down the stairs to our machine.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline L. Vorhauer

customer_reviews.title: The bag itself is great, but the hooks don't work on our door
customer_reviews.text: The bag itself is great, but the hooks don't work on our door. Same problem other reviewers have mentioned- they are too wide so that when there is weight on them they tilt and prevent the door from closing. I just hung it from hooks I mounted instead (see photo). Perfect size bag for baby clothes in the nursery!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Hangs on the back of my seven year olds door. Doesn’t hold a ton of clothes...not quite a full load. But I love that it’s slim and looks nice. When his door doesn’t lay flat against the wall, I know it’s time to do his laundry.
customer_reviews.author: mar

customer_reviews.title: Great style!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the style of bag I was looking for. Suggestion: to make this even better, I am going to buy adhesive "cord bundlers" and attach them to my laundry sink. It will stay in place better since the only gadgets given were the rings for over the door use AND will double as a laundry "skirt" to hide the items on the floor underneath the sink. Also, I would suggest a heavier fabric (maybe waterproof); as I often throw in wet clothes and towels and I expect it will soak easily.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa L.

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: My baby girl stays in our room and I didn’t want to add another laundry basket in our walk in closet. Her clothes are tiny so she doesn’t need a big hamper. This works great hangs on the door out of the way and I can easily throw her clothes on the washer with the zipper at the bottom. I think I might purchase 2 more for my sons.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, quality a little questionable
customer_reviews.text: I feel like the quality of this isn't super great and I'm sort of just waiting for the zipper in the bottom to fall out. It is really nice to keep laundry OFF the floor in our closet of a bathroom so far, though. The zipper is super handy. And it's a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Dirty
customer_reviews.text: I just opened this package and it has something black and greasy all over it. It transferred onto my hand too.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this thing! It saved me some space in my room and it's super convenient. I will be getting one for the bathroom as well. I saw some reviews about the hooks not being that great, but I haven't had any issues with them. They work very nicely. Buy it! :)
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price point.
customer_reviews.text: Now i would be hesitant to stuff a bunch of jeans into it , i have stuffed mine with only shirts to the brim to test it, and so far after a week , no damage ,hangs on my door no problem. Overall a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Reid

customer_reviews.title: Sent me an awful knock off after reordering
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one and it was fabulous. Made of a high quality material and looked good. I then ordered two more being aware that it was going to be a while before I got them because they were out. I waited and when I received my next two they were cheap nylon/plastic instead of the canvas material I ordered and are not even usable they’re so low quality. Not sure what happened.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Graham

customer_reviews.title: I love the blue color and the zipper bottom to empty it into the washer. Very good for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this at my nail salon, I rent a very small space and do my own business towel laundry. I needed a way to take the bag home and back without it being too bulky or heavy. I am not using the over the door hangers it came with, I am using the strong 3M strips and this hangs on the wall out of the way next to my table. It's perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: IsThatSo

customer_reviews.title: Good but too high for younger kids to reach hole
customer_reviews.text: the only problem I have with this laundry hanger is that it does not hang low enough for my kid to reach to put his laundry in it if you hang it over the door I'm sure there's some solution I haven't thought of but I think it should have came with longer adjustable straps.
customer_reviews.author: moreheadcity

customer_reviews.title: Laundry bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice for babies room. Don’t see how adult clothes or jeans wouldn’t tear or put some heavy wear on this. It is a this fabric. The zipper on the bottom is convenient. I would say if you have small jobs it would work great. Think this would fit 3 out fits from my 12 year old. So great buy for babies or toddler room. Easy install. Hooks go right over door.
customer_reviews.author: R L G

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for dirty laundry
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this. It hangs discreetly on the back of the door. Holds a LOT of laundry. *Note - the over-the-door-hangers didn't work for my door. Per the recommendations of several reviewers I had ordered the Command Jumbo Utility Hook (order 2) at the same time. Glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: A B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3 of them for the kids room. My kiddos were notorious for leaving their clothes on the floor so I hope this will encourage them to pick up after themselves:) The nook's seem to be well made. I cannot judge on the durability just yet. The hooks do not keep the door from closing. It was also nice that they included some strips of foam to place on the hooks to keep them from scratching the door/door frame. The size is perfect and does not take up very much space. Overall, I am happy with my purchase. I would purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing small spaces
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing for our small home- I have two in the back of our laundry room door. Not sure about durability yet as haven’t had them long but they seem to be well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: TBear

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our RV. We needed one for a small space, we hang it on the towel rack in the bathroom, with two small clips.It looks like it will work fine. Seems well made for the price I paid. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is great for someone who lacks square footage
customer_reviews.text: I just moved into a tiny home and I severely lack square footage so I've been trying to find the most on-the-wall and over-the-door storage I can. This thing is great. It can hold a whole "large" load of laundry and it can take quite a bit of weight. I like that it has a zipper opening on the bottom so that when laundry day comes all I have to do is unzip it over my washer and I'm good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: SURVIVING a 17yr old
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loving this product!!!! My 17-year-old has been using this for just over a month now and it looks like it did the first day I bought it. With it being winter time it is been stuffed full of jeans sweaters and towels. I am happy to say there is no signs of tears or seems in distress. A++++ product!!!
customer_reviews.author: SHANNA PENLEY

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product overall!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I just bought 2 of them. We have 3 kids and need all the space we can get. I would deduct a half star for the hooks. However, since my husband was somehow able to get them to work, I will round up from 4.5 to 5 stars (since Amazon only does whole stars). Shipping was fast, and Manny had been conscientious about checking on our satisfaction with the hampers. Highly recommended. Lucy McNamara
customer_reviews.author: enya1978

customer_reviews.title: Great! Decent easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This package came with the bag, and two hooks. The hooks were flimsy and practically useless, otherwise I'd have given it 5 stars. The bag is amazing- so far its durable, and it's about the size of a large pillowcase. The fabric is sturdy, and I like the zipper on the bottom of the bag for easy laundry removal.
customer_reviews.author: Adri

customer_reviews.title: Love this space saving hamper!
customer_reviews.text: Love this hanging hamper! Perfect for saving space in my fifth wheel. It holds enough clothes between washes which isn't everyday when you are full time rv'ers. Tucked away behind he door and hidden from view! Thanks :)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Great for nursery!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hamper. We use it in our nursery now for our two boys: a toddler and a newborn. Just dump the clothes in! Also it takes up no floor space which is important to us city apartment dwellers! The quality is great - worth the price. One thing I did to customize this is I hung it on two latge Command hooks because the doors are about 7' tall.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Harkins

customer_reviews.title: Great Space-Saver
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and a great space saver. The zipper on the back makes it easy to remove dirty clothes without taking the bag down. The only reason i gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is that bag is a bit smaller than I would like. It has about the capacity of a laundry basket (rather than a hamper) so you have to do laundry more often. Not that big of a deal if you have your own washer/dryer though.
customer_reviews.author: A. Standiford

customer_reviews.title: It's washable and sensible.
customer_reviews.text: Easy peasy! Hung these up with some command hooks on my 4 year-old son's closet door. He puts his own clothes in the hamper and I take it to do laundry easily. It's washable and sensible.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBrugs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for a small space.
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Hangs on the back of my door, leaving floor space clear. I’m surprised at how much it will hold.
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. Holds about one load of laundry. The pink color is more of a peachy-pink than a bright pink. Fabric is thin, but durable enough to carry back and forth to the washer.
customer_reviews.author: L. Karbowski

customer_reviews.title: No more piles of clothes on the bathroom floor!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect solution for a small bathroom without a lot of floor space! I like that it has a zipper opening at the bottom to make it easy to dump in the washer. The over door hooks also came with small pads to keep from damaging the door and keep them from banging / making noise or affecting the way the door closes. The grey color goes well with our bathroom color scheme.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia S.

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small home, so as I was rearranging furniture in the master bedroom to accommodate a new baby, I knew the hamper was taking up much needed floor space. When I first saw this product, I was skeptical because I thought it would be crazy difficult to get the dirty clothes out and into the washer. But then, I noticed the wonderful zipper that some genius added to the bottom of the bag. I bought two. One for me, one for the husband, and am considering getting another exclusively for towels to store in the bathroom. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: ruthann

customer_reviews.title: Great for saving space.
customer_reviews.text: Was very easy to put together and now it's very convenient to have instead of using a bulky cloths laundry bin. Getting the clothes out is also easy as the zipper glides smoothly with no hiccup, it does feel like I'm opening a creature and it's insides fall out but that's for us who imagine too much. I'm now recommending it to my friend and family.
customer_reviews.author: vivian cheek

customer_reviews.title: Great item for kids room
customer_reviews.text: Great for space saving, and getting the kids involved in doing their own laundry. The hamper makes it easy for them to fill and empty with the zip closure on bottom. Makes sorting and separating the laundry easier.
customer_reviews.author: littleshopper84

customer_reviews.title: door doesnt close all the way without force
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a small apartment to make some space. I had a little trouble closing the door with the hooks on the door . Luckily the door i hung it on doesn't need to be closed . Other than that the material is sturdy and it holds a lot of clothes.
customer_reviews.author: PRISCILLA MARIN

customer_reviews.title: This Laundry Bag is perfect and amazing
customer_reviews.text: This Laundry Bag is perfect and amazing. It's very well made. And durable. It has a Zipper for easy dump of clothes into washer or floor. It comes with metal hooks ready for your door with no hard labor needed. Saves a ton of space. The Blue color looks awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cody Lee Hart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby’s room
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I bought two. Blow out diapers, spit up, whatever... just throw it in the bag and then wash It. Easy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this hamper
customer_reviews.text: I love this hamper! Its perfect for smaller bedrooms where there isn't enough room for a basket. The hooks were a little wide for the size of the door, but after bending them slightly they work great and the door still closes with no difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good space saving solution!
customer_reviews.text: Love, except that the zipper is not the highest quality. Seems back on track now, but separated while zipped one of the first days I had it. other than that, nice looking and very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: EmG

customer_reviews.title: Love the hamper
customer_reviews.text: Love the hamper. The color matches the picture perfectly (I got the blue) and looks very pretty an vibrant. The hooks that came with the hamper were bending within a few days, even though the hamper wasn't even filled with clothes. They bent so much that I had to buy different hooks (that work much better). I suggest anyone buying this also buy some sturdier hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Kipper Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not complete
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed. I was really excited to add this to our nursery, but when I opened the package... there were no metal hangers. So now I have to return and wait for another one. I hope it get here before the baby is born.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for laundry collection problems!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great solution to our kitchen laundry problems. We were in the habit of throwing our laundry down the stairs and collecting it whenever we did laundry. However, with this lightweight laundry bag I am able to hang this on the door to the basement and collect the dirty laundry (ie towels and bibs etc) rather than walking over it all in the basement. It's a clean solution to a laundry problem!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Salton

customer_reviews.title: The bag and straps are sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: The bag and straps are sturdy and well made. Bought this for my husband's work uniforms, he works for solid waste so we definitely keep his work clothes in a separate hamper in the garage BUT for some reason they rarely make it the garage as he opts to leave them on the floor of our small bathroom or on the floor of our even smaller room closet. Finally...after 14 yrs I found a solution! I hung this from the inside bathroom door and viola... no more uniforms on floors all week!! It worked!!! Thank you from 'happy wife- happy life' !
customer_reviews.author: Jessy

customer_reviews.title: Great, Roomy, Ordering MORE
customer_reviews.text: It was much bigger than I expected in person. We have a bar contraption in our closet with varying levels, I simply unscrewed the end of the bar and slipped this on. It grazes the floor but that's ok, and it is so perfect that I am going to order two more in the neutral color for the master bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: L. Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Can hole up!
customer_reviews.text: Fabric split open at the bottom of laundry bag. We only put baby clothing in it, which are very light weight. Wish I could return.
customer_reviews.author: Alaine

customer_reviews.title: Loved everything but the hooks
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything but the hooks. They are too thick and large to close my door with. This makes it's convience, an inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Tamalyn

customer_reviews.title: great for small homes!
customer_reviews.text: love this hamper its great for apartment living. this is my second one becareful to not over stuff it or it will eventually wear out and the zipper will bust.
customer_reviews.author: Jl

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is mainly used for all of our towels and wash clothes and it’s been awesome. The zipper bottom is genius- I just empty out the bag into the wash. And, whenever it needs it, I just throw the bag in with the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Castaneto

customer_reviews.title: So happy!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hamper!! It’s so convenient to not have a hamper on the floor. And the zipper on the backside makes it super easy to unload the clothes into the washing machine.

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love it! The color is so bright and cheerful! Fits my laundry perfectly, easy to transport to the washing machine, and is discreet. I especially love the hole on the front because at night I attempt to throw my socks in from my bed!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Great for Nursery
customer_reviews.text: This is a great space saver. We hung it on the back of the door in our nursery. It’s so easy to unhook when it’s full. The zipper on the bottom makes dumping the laundry into the washer so easy. And since we use it for our baby we can dump the laundry without touching dirty or wet clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Hersh

customer_reviews.title: Practical
customer_reviews.text: What I love about this is that you can literally hang it anywhere. Currently, it's on the back of our bedroom door, but the fact that we can even use Command Hooks and place it anywhere makes it super convenient. We have a rather small room, and this is definitely a space saver and I am SO glad we got it. I also love that there is a zipper on the bottom of it so just one zip and all the clothes are out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Efficient, Well-Designed, and Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I'm thrilled to get a cool and convenient design and know that I'm supporting a small business! I have to admit that the hamper isn't quite enjoying its full intended glory, but I'm planning to make it a neat door frame all its own in the very near future. Until then, it's actually sharing space with other over-the-door hooks and still doing a fabulous job! I'm already thinking of buying another for myself and maybe one for my family members! It's carrying capacity isn't huge, but it'll actually remind me to do appropriately-sized loads of laundry!
customer_reviews.author: Emtres

customer_reviews.title: the hamper is great. I love that I can unzip the bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: The supplied hooks don't fit my closet door properly, causing the door to not close unless I reach up and adjust the hooks every time I close the door. Other than that, the hamper is great. I love that I can unzip the bottom and release all the clothes into a laundry hamper, and also that I can toss the hamper into the laundry to keep it fresh.
customer_reviews.author: L. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great hamper
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I used it for two years over the door, but when I moved my doors were too tall so I put it on the doorknob.
customer_reviews.author: Donna F

product_meta.title: Urban Mom Door Hanging Laundry Hamper with Stainless Steel Hooks (Gray)
feature_bullets: Hangs behind your door with stainless steel hooks included super space saver
Perfect for Families and College Dorms that need more room
Machine washable made from quality cotton canvas will last a long time
Back side zipper to easily drop out washing or easy to carry to the laundry
AVOID FAKES - This product is sold exclusively by Urban Mom. Click on New (2) below and choose Urban Mom for the original.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,592 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
